profile:
The Peoples Painter Ltd.' company was created in 2021 with a clear objective: to provide clients with a positive experience from the start to finish of their renovation.

Owned and operated by Trevor Peoples, he and  his  dedicated  team have over 35 years combined experience in the residential, commercial  and industrial painting industry spanning across Canada , Ireland and the U.K.

From full interior/ exterior renovations to deck staining and everything in between, let the Peoples Painter team deliver results that will take the stress out of your renovation and allow you to enjoy the process.

                                                   Fully WCB Licensed and Insured
